_comment: bench-05: Full realistic app. Every rule fires. Tests isolation — MANUAL must not contaminate adjacent SAFE changes.
notes: SearchController: shallow $watch, only 2 scope writes — SAFE + BehaviorSubject injected
OrderController: $q.defer AND deep $watch — MANUAL on both counts
AdminController: 5 scope writes, no watch. With threshold=6 (current default) → SAFE
CRITICAL: OrderController MANUAL must not bleed into SearchController or AdminController
This is the hardest benchmark — tests rule isolation under realistic load
